home_meta_description: FetchTube helps you download videos quickly with clean UI, safe flow, and premium options.
privacy_meta_description: Privacy policy for FetchTube - free online video downloader. Learn how we handle your data and protect your privacy.
account_checkout_success: Payment completed. If the plan has not updated yet, wait a few seconds for webhook sync.
home_error_invalid_url: Please enter a valid YouTube URL.
home_error_no_streams: No downloadable streams were found for this video.
home_choose_format_hint: Choose format and quality, then download directly.
home_hero_subtitle: Paste a link, click the button, and get back to your life. No ads, no malware, just pure joy.
home_playlist_title: Need the whole playlist, not just one video?
home_playlist_subtitle: Drop one playlist URL. FetchTube queues, prepares, and downloads each video automatically.
home_step1_desc: Browse your favorite sites like YouTube or TikTok and copy the URL.
home_step2_desc: Drop it into our mega input bar above. It glows when it's ready!
home_step3_desc: Click fetch and enjoy high quality video offline, anywhere.
home_tools_subtitle: We built shiny tools to make your life easier. Choose your fighter.
home_tool_extension_desc: Adds a cute "Fetch" button right under every video player.
home_tool_bookmarklet_desc: No install needed. Drag this pill to your bookmarks bar!
home_tool_script_desc: For Tampermonkey users. Get raw control.
home_testimonials_subtitle: Don't just take our word for it. Join thousands of happy fetchers who save time every day.
home_testimonial_sarah_quote: "My grandma uses this! It's literally the only downloader she doesn't call me for help with."
home_testimonial_mike_quote: "I save recipe videos for the kitchen where the WiFi doesn't reach. A literal lifesaver."
download_btn_legal_prefix: By using FetchTube, you accept our
privacy_section_1_body: Welcome to FetchTube. We respect your privacy and are committed to protecting your personal data. This privacy policy explains how we collect, use, and safeguard your information when you use our video downloader service.
privacy_info_video_urls_body: When you use our service, we temporarily process the video URLs you submit to extract download information. These URLs are not stored permanently on our servers.
privacy_info_usage_data_body: We collect anonymous usage statistics including pages visited, features used, and error reports to improve our service.
privacy_info_device_info_body: We collect technical information such as browser type, operating system, and device type to optimize your experience.
privacy_info_cookies_body: We use cookies and similar technologies to enhance your browsing experience and improve site performance. See our Cookie Policy below for details.
privacy_section_3_intro: We use the collected information for the following purposes:
privacy_section_3_item_1: To provide and maintain our video downloading service
privacy_section_3_item_2: To improve and optimize our website performance
privacy_section_3_item_3: To analyze usage patterns and trends
privacy_section_3_item_4: To detect and prevent abuse of our service
privacy_section_4_body_1: We use cookies and similar tracking technologies to track activity on our service and hold certain information. Cookies are files with a small amount of data that may include an anonymous unique identifier.
privacy_cookie_essential_body: Required for the website to function properly. These cannot be disabled.
privacy_cookie_analytics_body: Help us understand how visitors interact with our website by collecting and reporting information anonymously.
privacy_cookie_preference_body: Remember your settings and provide a more consistent experience across visits.
privacy_section_4_body_2: You can manage your cookie preferences through the consent banner that appears when you first visit our site, or by clearing your browser cookies.
privacy_section_5_intro: We use the following third-party services:
privacy_service_google_body: For website analytics and usage statistics.
privacy_service_cloudflare_body: For website security and performance optimization.
privacy_section_6_body: We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your personal data against unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction. However, no method of transmission over the Internet is 100% secure, and we cannot guarantee absolute security.
privacy_section_7_intro: We retain your information only for as long as necessary to fulfill the purposes outlined in this policy:
privacy_section_7_item_1: Video URLs are processed in real-time and not stored permanently
privacy_section_7_item_2: Analytics data is retained for up to 26 months
privacy_section_7_item_3: Cookie consent preferences are stored until you clear your browser data
privacy_section_8_intro: Depending on your location, you may have the following rights regarding your personal data:
privacy_right_access_body: Request a copy of your personal data
privacy_right_erasure_body: Request deletion of your personal data
privacy_right_object_body: Object to processing of your personal data
privacy_section_8_outro: To exercise these rights, please contact us using the information provided below.
privacy_section_9_body: Our service is not intended for use by children under the age of 13. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children under 13. If you become aware that a child has provided us with personal information, please contact us.
privacy_section_10_body: We may update our Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on this page and updating the "Last updated" date. You are advised to review this Privacy Policy periodically for any changes.
privacy_section_11_intro: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy or our data practices, please contact us:
privacy_section_12_intro: For users in the European Economic Area (EEA), we comply with the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR). Our legal basis for processing personal data is:
privacy_gdpr_legitimate_interest_body: For essential service functionality and security
privacy_section_12_outro: You have the right to lodge a complaint with a supervisory authority if you believe our processing of your personal data violates applicable law.
